name: Sklearn Polynomial
description: Polynomial regression is a special case of linear regression, which generates a new feature matrix consisting of all polynomial combinations of the features with degree less than or equal to the specified degree.

fields.name: targetCol
fields.title: Target Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: degree
fields.title: Degree
fields.description: The degree of the polynomial features. Default = 2.

fields.name: interactiononly
fields.title: Interaction Only
fields.description: If true, only interaction features are produced: features that are products of at most ``degree`` *distinct* input features (so not``x[1] ** 2``, ``x[0] * x[2] ** 3``, etc.)

fields.name: includebias
fields.title: Include Bias
fields.description: True (default), then include a bias column, the feature in which all polynomial powers are zero.
